job_details.Functieomschrijving:
We are looking for a junior developer with experience in an object oriented programming language, who is interested in utilizing (and/or learning) Java and Python to deliver services & libraries that add value to our Search as a Service platform. You will be part of a mature, cross-functional team that is responsible for the end-to-end delivery of these services, which includes design, security, development, testing and deployment of services & back-end components.

   The project is focused on the delivery of services within the search domain with a service architecture that utilizes Solr, query parsing, dictionaries, cloud platforms, and 3rd party technologies in its delivery. Joining the team would offer the opportunity to learn about technologies in the content domain, use AWS services, and learn from a mature development team. As a member of an agile team, we are looking for motivated and vocal individuals to collaborate and help build the best practices for the development team, and if lacking knowledge in one of the languages, we can provide training/resources to help learn either Java or Python.

   Joining the team would offer the opportunity to learn about the latest technologies in the domain of search technology, utilize & learn AWS technologies, and participate in a collaborative, flat team structure.

   You will report into the lead software engineer and work hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers. Your role is crucial to the continued growth and evolution of one of the leading companies providing expert solutions to the healthcare, compliance, legal and tax markets globally.

   Tasks and responsibilities

   * Write, test, review, document service-oriented applications in collaboration with onshore and offshore developers, mostly for the development of PoC's.

   * Identify potential opportunities for code optimization.

   * Provide input for code reviews and help with environment build deployments, release notes and build notices.

   * Maintain code sanity and promote & practise coding standards/practices within the team.

   * Document application design and logic

   * Research, identify and recommend operational improvements resulting in improved reliability and/or efficiencies in maintaining the application.

   * Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs across WK

   * Collaborate with team members and QA engineers to drive deeper integration of NLP, machine learning and AI technologies to enhance uptake & delivery of components.

   * Evaluate and advise on technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog with the project lead.

   * Continuously stay current on market trends and new technologies that can affect how we approach our solutions.
job_details.full_text:
Product Software Engineer

We are looking for a junior developer with experience in an object oriented programming language, who is interested in utilizing (and/or learning) Java and Python to deliver services & libraries that add value to our Search as a Service platform. You will be part of a mature, cross-functional team that is responsible for the end-to-end delivery of these services, which includes design, security, development, testing and deployment of services & back-end components.

   The project is focused on the delivery of services within the search domain with a service architecture that utilizes Solr, query parsing, dictionaries, cloud platforms, and 3rd party technologies in its delivery. Joining the team would offer the opportunity to learn about technologies in the content domain, use AWS services, and learn from a mature development team. As a member of an agile team, we are looking for motivated and vocal individuals to collaborate and help build the best practices for the development team, and if lacking knowledge in one of the languages, we can provide training/resources to help learn either Java or Python.

   Joining the team would offer the opportunity to learn about the latest technologies in the domain of search technology, utilize & learn AWS technologies, and participate in a collaborative, flat team structure.

   You will report into the lead software engineer and work hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers. Your role is crucial to the continued growth and evolution of one of the leading companies providing expert solutions to the healthcare, compliance, legal and tax markets globally.

   Tasks and responsibilities

   * Write, test, review, document service-oriented applications in collaboration with onshore and offshore developers, mostly for the development of PoC's.

   * Identify potential opportunities for code optimization.

   * Provide input for code reviews and help with environment build deployments, release notes and build notices.

   * Maintain code sanity and promote & practise coding standards/practices within the team.

   * Document application design and logic

   * Research, identify and recommend operational improvements resulting in improved reliability and/or efficiencies in maintaining the application.

   * Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs across WK

   * Collaborate with team members and QA engineers to drive deeper integration of NLP, machine learning and AI technologies to enhance uptake & delivery of components.

   * Evaluate and advise on technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog with the project lead.

   * Continuously stay current on market trends and new technologies that can affect how we approach our solutions.

profile_classification.rationale: The job description focuses on traditional software engineering tasks within a search domain, mentioning AI/ML and NLP as areas for integration rather than the core focus. It emphasizes object-oriented programming, service development, and collaboration within an agile team, aligning more with a general software engineering role. While it mentions learning AI/ML technologies, the primary responsibilities and technologies listed (Java, Python, Solr, AWS) do not strongly indicate a specialized ML or GenAI Engineer role. The role is described as 'junior developer' and 'Product Software Engineer', further suggesting a broader software development focus rather than a specialized AI engineering profile.

job_tasks.justification: The description repeatedly mentions 'developer', 'design, security, development, testing and deployment of services & back-end components', 'service-oriented applications', 'code optimization', 'code reviews', 'coding standards/practices', 'document application design and logic', and 'architecture, assets and tools'. These are all core activities of software development.
job_tasks.phrase: design, security, development, testing and deployment of services & back-end components

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Write, test, review, document service-oriented applications' directly describes software development activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Write, test, review, document service-oriented applications

job_tasks.justification: Identifying opportunities for 'code optimization' is a common task in software development to improve performance and efficiency.
job_tasks.phrase: Identify potential opportunities for code optimization

job_tasks.justification: Providing input for 'code reviews' and managing 'environment build deployments, release notes and build notices' are standard software development lifecycle activities.
job_tasks.phrase: Provide input for code reviews and help with environment build deployments, release notes and build notices

job_tasks.justification: Maintaining 'code sanity and promote & practise coding standards/practices' is fundamental to software development quality assurance.
job_tasks.phrase: Maintain code sanity and promote & practise coding standards/practices within the team

job_tasks.justification: Documenting 'application design and logic' is a crucial part of the software development process for maintainability and knowledge transfer.

Researching and recommending 'operational improvements resulting in improved reliability and/or efficiencies in maintaining the application' falls under the umbrella of operations and maintenance, which is related to MLOps in the context of AI/ML systems.
job_tasks.phrase: Research, identify and recommend operational improvements resulting in improved reliability and/or efficiencies in maintaining the application

job_tasks.justification: Contributing to 'driving the architecture, assets and tools' is a software development responsibility related to system design and infrastructure.
job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs across WK

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'integration of NLP, machine learning and AI technologies' indicates involvement in applying these modeling techniques, even if it's through integration rather than core development.
job_tasks.phrase: integration of NLP, machine learning and AI technologies

job_tasks.justification: Evaluating and advising on 'technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog' involves understanding requirements and technical feasibility, which is part of the software development process.
job_tasks.phrase: Evaluate and advise on technical aspects of open work requests in the product backlog

job_tasks.justification: The job mentions a 'Search as a Service platform' that utilizes 'Solr, query parsing, dictionaries, cloud platforms'. Solr and query parsing are related to data indexing and retrieval, which are aspects of data engineering for search systems.

The role is described as 'crucial to the continued growth and evolution of one of the leading companies providing expert solutions to the healthcare, compliance, legal and tax markets globally', indicating a need to understand the business context and market.
job_tasks.phrase: continued growth and evolution of one of the leading companies providing expert solutions to the healthcare, compliance, legal and tax markets globally

job_tasks.justification: The description emphasizes 'collaborate with team members', 'work hand in hand with business, product leaders, customers, and developers', and being 'motivated and vocal individuals to collaborate'.
job_tasks.phrase: collaborate with team members and QA engineers

job_tasks.justification: The job explicitly states 'interested in utilizing (and/or learning) Java and Python', 'opportunity to learn about technologies in the content domain, use AWS services, and learn from a mature development team', and 'if lacking knowledge in one of the languages, we can provide training/resources to help learn either Java or Python'. This highlights a strong emphasis on learning and adaptability.
job_tasks.phrase: interested in utilizing (and/or learning) Java and Python

job_tasks.justification: The task 'Identify potential opportunities for code optimization' and 'Research, identify and recommend operational improvements' implies a problem-solving approach to enhance efficiency and reliability.
job_tasks.phrase: Identify potential opportunities for code optimization

job_tasks.justification: The phrase 'Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs' suggests taking initiative and ownership in shaping the technical direction.
job_tasks.phrase: Contribute to driving the architecture, assets and tools required to meet our current and future needs across WK

job_tasks.justification: The statement 'Continuously stay current on market trends and new technologies that can affect how we approach our solutions' directly points to the need for continuous learning and adaptation.
job_tasks.phrase: Continuously stay current on market trends and new technologies
